title: Purdy, Bosa out for 49ers; Allen to start at QB
description: The 49ers will start Brandon Allen at QB on Sunday against the Packers in place of an injured Brock Purdy, coach Kyle Shanahan said Friday. DE Nick Bosa also will miss the game with injuries to his left hip and oblique.
author: Nick Wagoner

title: Giants agree to cut Jones: Best for QB and team
description: The Giants are granting Daniel Jones' request to be released, saying the sides mutually agreed that it "would be best for him and for the team" to move on.
author: Jordan Raanan

title: 'Dreamer' Amorim 'right guy' to revive Man Utd
description: Ruben Amorim says he is the "right guy at the right time" to turn Manchester United around.

title: 'I will be here' - Guardiola's relegation promise to Man City
description: Pep Guardiola says he will stand by Manchester City even if they are relegated over alleged breaches of financial rules.

title: If Army upsets Notre Dame, it could upend the entire playoff structure
description: Army is 9-0 despite not being able to take advantage of NIL and the transfer portal. Saturday's showdown at Yankee Stadium has major CFP ramifications.
author: Yahoo Sports

title: Chiefs find potential left tackle fix with D.J. Humphries signing
description: D.J. Humphries could be a huge pick-up for the Chiefs.
author: Yahoo Sports

title: Amorim meets Neville to talk Ten Hag, Sir Alex and INEOS
description: Ruben Amorim has told Manchester United fans not to confuse his happiness for naivety as he sat down with Sky Sports' Gary Neville for an in-depth interview ahead of his first game at Ipswich.

title: 'Demanding, intense, authentic': Inside Amorim's first week at Man Utd
description: The irony was not lost on Manchester United staff.
